name: Solstice Party at the Edge of the World
name_original: Solstice Party at the Edge of the World
description:
You are a cook invited to cater the solstice party at the edge of the world. Cook burgers and unravel the deeper philosophical meaning behind your world's existence!

Made for 12 Days of Sketchmas Game Jam 2022
